page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: Living in the country presents certain problems.Some people who do not own a car have to use the bus service which only comes four days a week.On each day it only makes one trip.Most people use the bus to go shopping.A local taxi service is provided to take pupils to and from school.It also gets the school dinners for our school from Alves.Although some people use the bus to go shopping they use their car to go to work in Elgin or Forres.The people who work at the distillery cycle or walk.The majority of the vehicles in our area belong to the Forestry Commission.Most of these lorries are used to transport trees.A greater percentage of the remaning lorries are used by the distillery.
